info.title: Information
info.description: Data can be entered as Pairs: Calibration Table-Input:Unit; Linear Regression1 Input@0:Input/Unit; Linear Regression2 u=(x*a0+a1)*a2+a3; Polynomial-Base:Exponent); Frequency Response Table-Frequency:Amplitude

Standard Test Method for Consolidated Drained Triaxial Compression Test for Soils, 2020, ASTM D7181-20
Standard Test Method for Unconsolidated-Undrained Triaxial Compression Test on Cohesive Soils, 2016, ASTM D2850-15
